summary: The story follows six very different men and their struggles with women, family and work. Yet, they are somehow connected to each other.
cast: Christian Ulmen|Nadja Uhl|Wotan Wilke Möhring|Maxim Mehmet|Jana Pallaske|Florian David Fitz|Liane Forestieri|Til Schweiger|Justus von Dohnányi|Inez Bjørg David|Fritz Karl|Fahri Yardim|Palina Rojinski|Birge Schade|Carl Heinz Choynski|Amon Robert Wendel|Millane Kaituli|Amar Saaifan|Stephan Luca|Bastian Pastewka|Dieter Moor|Guido Foehrweisser|Georg Tryphon|Antoine Monot Jr.|Elyas M'Barek|Arndt Schwering-Sohnrey|Beate Maes|Traute Hoess|Nezâ Selbuz|Dennis Gansel|Nika von Altenstadt|Emma Schweiger|Vincenzo Rosso|Janina Rudenska|Kirk Kirchberger|Nora Huetz|Harald Siebler|Peer Martiny|Heike Schober|Hieu Hoang Due|Martina Ysker|Max Mauff|Hana Nitsche|Sandra Ahrabian|Anne-Kathrin Wendler|Yvonne Schröder|Camilla Kuppert|Marc Malze|Fabian Massah|Simon Verhoeven|Holger Wiegandt|Stefan Langel|Pia Krack|Sara Isma-Ae|Luca Verhoeven|Frederik Klaus
title: Männerherzen
